subject: Re: [Ip-health] drug naming/patents/exclusivity
body:
There are a few other examples that I know of:

Lilly sells fluoxetine as Prozac (antidepressant) and Serafem (premenstrual
dysphoric disorder)

GSK sells buproprion as Wellbutrin (antidepressant) and Zyban (smoking
cessation)

Joel Lexchin
